item.title: About Me
item.description: Your ‘About Me’ page should convey: What are you currently doing (in regard to your career) and how did you get there? In terms of the work you do, what aspects are you most passionate about and why? What do you consider some of your biggest professional and personal accomplishments? Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache Licence 2.0. Hugo supports TOML, YAML and JSON data file types, Markdown and HTML content files and uses shortcodes to add rich content.
